item.title: Day 0 - 66 Days To Build A Habit
item.description: 66 days. In a 2009 study by Lally et al.Â (2009), researchers found that their study of 96 individuals took on average 66 days to truly form a habit. While the amount of time varied from 18 to 254 days, 66 gives us a definitive number to work towards. Change has, and always will be difficult. It takes dedication, intention, and a commitment to breaking old habits, even when it becomes painful.
